name: Hide
description:
The game takes place under the ground in an ancient building not yet discovered. The second World War is raging and you took shelter there when the enemy forces overwhelmed your camp. Before going under you requested help. Now you just wait and hope.

This is a short survival game made under 48 hours for the Last Minute game jam, which is also my first jam :)

WARNING: HIGHLY UNOPTIMISED! MIGHT BLOW UP.
